languages.text: {n}Ваш двойник решительно сжимает кулак на причудливой формы талисмане из призрачной кости. Такие амулеты эльдары носят в знак об особой близости с кем-то из сородичей... Или в знак памяти о погибшем.{/n}

{n}Your doppelganger resolutely clenches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of a special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the dead.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш двойник решительно сжимает кулак на причудливой формы талисмане из призрачной кости. Такие амулеты эльдары носят в знак об особой близости с кем-то из сородичей... Или в знак памяти о погибшем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your double resolutely clutches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the deceased.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: {n}Your doppelganger resolutely clenches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of a special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the dead.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: {n}Your doppelganger resolutely clenches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of a special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the dead.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}Votre sosie serre fermement dans son poing un talisman de moelle spectrale à la forme étrange. Les Aeldaris portent des amulettes de ce genre qui témoignent de leur lien spécial avec quelqu'un... ou représentent une personne défunte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger resolutely clenches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of a special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre sosie serre fermement dans son poing un talisman de moelle spectrale à la forme étrange. Les Aeldaris portent des amulettes de ce genre qui témoignent de leur lien spécial avec quelqu'un... ou représentent une personne défunte.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}Tu copia aprieta con fuerza un singular talismán de hueso espectral. Los Aeldari llevan estos amuletos como muestra de un vínculo especial con alguien... o como recuerdo de los difuntos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger resolutely clenches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of a special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu copia aprieta con fuerza un singular talismán de hueso espectral. Los Aeldari llevan estos amuletos como muestra de un vínculo especial con alguien... o como recuerdo de los difuntos.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}你的复制人紧紧握着一枚灵骨制成的护身符，眼神中充满了决心。艾达灵族常常会戴着这样的护身符，象征着与某人特别的联系……或是用来纪念某个逝去的人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger resolutely clenches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of a special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的复制人紧紧地握着一枚灵骨制成的护身符，眼神中充满了决心。艾达灵族常常会戴着这样的护身符，象征着与某人特别的联系……或是用来纪念逝去的人们。{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}あなたのドッペルゲンガーはその拳で奇妙な形をした幽骨のお守りを握りしめていた。アエルダリはこのようなお守りを、誰かとの特別な絆の証として…あるいは故人を偲ぶ証として身に着けるという。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger resolutely clenches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of a special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたのドッペルゲンガーはその拳で奇妙な形をした幽骨のお守りを握りしめていた。アエルダリはこのようなお守りを、誰かとの特別な絆の証として…あるいは故人を偲ぶ証として身に着けるという。{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}{mf|Dein Doppelgänger|Deine Doppelgängerin} hält mit der Faust einen merkwürdig geformten Talisman aus Phantomkristall fest umschlossen. Die Aeldari tragen solche Amulette als Zeichen einer besonderen Bindung zu jemandem ... Oder als Erinnerung an einen Verstorbenen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger resolutely clenches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of a special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Dein Doppelgänger|Deine Doppelgängerin} hält mit der Faust einen merkwürdig geformten Talisman aus Phantomkristall fest umschlossen. Die Aeldari tragen solche Amulette als Zeichen einer besonderen Bindung zu jemandem ... Oder als Erinnerung an einen Verstorbenen.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}Suretçalan; avcunda tuttuğu, tuhaf şekilli bir tayfkemik nazarlığı kararlılık içinde sıkıyor. Aeldariler bu uğurlukları birisiyle aralarındaki özel bağın simgesi ya da ölülerin hatırası olarak taşırlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger resolutely clenches {mf|his|her} fist around an oddly shaped wraithbone talisman. The Aeldari wear such amulets as a token of a special bond with someone... Or a token of remembrance for the dead.{/n}
